alert.note: Alert for Meeker (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 11:28PM CDT until July 26 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Meeker County in central Minnesota... * Until 1230 AM CDT. * At 1127 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Atwater, or 14 miles east of Willmar, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Litchfield around 1145 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Dassel. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
